channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2787] Apology Slip
[+2130] Battlestar Babes Grace The Cover of Maxim (Awesome Pic)
[+1927] 7 New Professors on RateMyProfessors.com [IMG]
[+1556] If Digg Was a Newspaper [PIC]
item.description: What the Internet has done to journalism.

item.title: [+1494] Why Do Conservatives Hate America?
item.description: Somebody explain this to me: The president of the United States wins the Nobel Peace Prize, and Rush Limbaugh joins with the Taliban in bitterly denouncing the award?Why Do Conservatives Hate America?

item.title: [+1056] The Mini Skirt: Then and Now (PICS)
item.description: Guys love them and girls love to wear them. This gallery looks into the life of the mini skirt, from novel attire in the '60s to an every-day garment today.

item.title: [+1025] Farmers Arrested Planting Hemp On DEA Headquarters Lawn
item.description: A group of civilly-disobedient hemp farmers and business leaders were arrested Tuesday morning while digging up the lawn to plant industrial hemp seeds at the headquarters of the Drug Enforcement Administration. Cultivating industrial hemp, the non-psychoactive cousin of marijuana, is illegal under the "drug war."

item.title: [+913] The audacity of greed: how private health insurers just blew
item.description: their cover. Insurance companies say the Senate healthcare bill will force them to raise premiums. Time to call their bluff

item.title: [+891] Drunkest Guy Ever Goes for More Beer (Video)
item.description: Yes, this guy is unbelievably hammered, but check out the date and time. This happened at 10 in the morning...on a Tuesday.

item.title: [+831] Rumor: Apple To Switch On Sleeping FM Radio in iPhone & iPod
item.description: Reports suggest that Apple is on the cusp of releasing an FM radio application for the iPhone and iPod Touch. And get this: it will be for the current models.

item.title: [+825] Facebook Now Has 30,000 Servers, 25 Tb of Daily Log Data
item.description: A look at the fully-packed racks inside a Facebook data center facility.

item.title: [+801] The Expendables - Promo Trailer
item.description: A team of the world's most dangerous and highly-trained mercenaries go on a mission to South America to overthrow and assassinate a powerful, evil dictator and his army, who have been causing devastation, chaos and torture for the last twenty years.

item.title: [+796] Thirty Republicans - YouTube Video
item.description: In 2009, the Senate voted to not fund companies which force their employees to forfeit their rights to sue for sexual assault or harassment.Thirty Senators voted against this amendment. All of them republican.Everybody needs to know about this.

item.title: [+727] Reinventing Desktop Human-Computer Interaction [Video]
item.description: This video examines the benefits and limitations inherent in current mouse-based and window-oriented interfaces, the problems facing other potential solutions, and visualizes a proposal for a completely new way of interacting with desktop computers.

item.title: [+718] OMG! UBUNTU!: Is This The Face Of Google ChromeOS?
item.description: Perhaps the first look at what ChromeOS will be like.

item.title: [+706] If God Had Wanted Me To Be Accepting Of Gays...
item.description: I don't question God. The Lord is my Shepherd and I shall put none above Him. Which is why I know that if it were part of God's plan for me to stop viciously condemning others based solely on their sexual preference, He would have seen fit—in His infinite wisdom and all—to have given me the tiniest bit of human empathy necessary to do so.

item.title: [+666] First black hole for light created on Earth
item.description: An electromagnetic "black hole" that sucks in surrounding light has been built for the first time.

item.title: [+654] Google Adds "F**K! Didn't Mean to Send That" Tool to Webmail
item.description: Google on Tuesday added an embarrassment-avoidance tool that catches misdirected Gmail messages before they are fired off by users of the free Web-based email service.

item.title: [+650] 10 Cool Extensions for Google Chrome
item.description: For a lot of us Google Chrome is still not hot enough. The reason? It’s still not extendable enough like Firefox. Ever since it came out, users have cried out for ways to tweak the browser to make it the Jack of all trades. Here are some of the cool extensions you'll confront for Google Chrome

item.title: [+587] Turkish Ice Cream Man Puts on a Show (Video)
item.description: This had better be some really good ice cream.
